overview:
Richard Lamb, President, has held executive and P/L responsibilities in 4 technology ventures since 1994, including 24/7 Media and Prism Communications Services; he has led raises of $8.5M in private equity financing, and delivered 300+% annual sales growth for diverse businesses in the media, internet technology and telecom sectors.

Mr. Lamb has 24 years of senior management experience, with proven effectiveness in Strategic Planning, Operations and IT/Communications management, including initiation and administration of large-scale telecom (voice, data and VoIP) usage contracts at News Corporation and Harper Collins, among others.

He is a graduate of Mercy College with a degree in Industrial Psychology.
